```{r}
library(readxl)
library(bruceR)
library(rstatix)
library(car)
library(dplyr)
data<-read_excel("hw9_data.xlsx")
data%>%
  group_by(Group)%>%
  shapiro_test(Pre)
data%>%
  group_by(Group)%>%
  shapiro_test(Mid)
data%>%
  group_by(Group)%>%
  shapiro_test(Post)
m<-MANOVA(data,
          dvs=c("Pre","Mid","Post"),
          dvs.pattern = "(.*)",
          between = "Group",
          within="time")
m1<-MANOVA(data,
          dvs=c("Pre","Mid","Post"),
          dvs.pattern = "(.*)",
          between = "Group",
          within="time",
          sph.correction = "GG")
EMMEANS(m1,effect = "time",p.adjust = "scheffe")
EMMEANS(m1,effect = "Group",by="time")
EMMEANS(m1,effect = "time",by="Group")
emmip(m1,time~Group,ylab="Accuracy")
```
